CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 22, 1958, pg. A23, reads: "Skating Party - Metoka skating party, the second annual such event, was held last week at the Diamond Skating Rink, where a king and queen were crowned by last year's queen, Joan Koon.  Savings Bonds were given as prizes to the winners.  Left to right: Nelson Harrison, king; John Harper Jr., Margaret Fleming, queen, and last year's queen, Joan Koon.  The Young Adult Metoka Club gave prizes to other contestants.  Margaret Mundy is president. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Nelson Harris, John Harper Jr. and Margaret Fleming holding savings bonds, and Joan Koon standing in front of painted brick wall
